summary: Seeking revenge, an athletic young man joins the pirate band responsible for his father's death.
cast: Billie Dove|Tempe Pigott|Donald Crisp|Sam De Grasse|Anders Randolf|Charles Stevens|John Wallace|Fred Becker|Charles Belcher|E.J. Ratcliffe|Douglas Fairbanks|Nino Cochise|Jimmy Dime|George Holt|Harold Kruger|Charles Lewis|Barry Norton|Mary Pickford|Bob Roper
title: El pirata negro
